[[inst_hl_sh_pr]]
==== HL.SH.PR

*Syntax:* hl.sh.pr SrcD, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<1], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sh_pr.svg[HL.SH.PR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PRE_INDEX
